Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Friends! Recently, you often ask questions about listing BIO on the stock exchange. We addressed your questions to the project's founder Boris Akimov. And this is what he said:  "At the moment, we have now 4 exchanges: Yobit, Livecoin, Profit, Uralcpro. We decided not to force events. We are negotiating. But first of all I want to add a coin, because it is interesting and not because someone paid money for it. Our task now is to create many tools for using coins. And this is the main point. In addition, despite the fact that many crypto-exchanges declare that the listing is free of charge, this is not so. And the amounts they demand are very high! We see more reasonable use of funds for the development of the BioCoin ecosystem. If the BIO token will be used daily, it will be popular, then the exchanges themselves will want to flood this coin. This is what we are trying to achieve. This is the right way."

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The main question that Boris Akimov asked yesterday at a meeting with the BioCoin Community was:  "How exactly does the partner's points score control? How does the BioCoin team verify that the partner does not earn more points than is available?"  This is definitely a good question. üôÇ We answer:  The operator and integration platform of the BioCoin's loyalty program are the guarantors of the fulfillment of obligations of partners. According to the rules, to enter the loyalty program, a partner needs to make a deposit in BIO. This deposit becomes the security of the issued bonus points. The integration platform is configured in such a way that it prompts, in advance, about the approximation of the amount of points issued to the limit. And we will send a notification to the partner about the need to replenish the deposit. Thus, the partner can not issue points more than he is ready to provide. However, the partner himself can control the process of issuing points in its personal account of the loyalty program.  Points will be awarded within 1 working day in the absence of technical restrictions from the partner. On the limitations and features of the scoring of points from specific partners, if they arise, we will inform in addition.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Boris Akimov:  "The bill on cryptocurrencies, which the State Duma adopted in the first reading, if nothing much changes, can only positively affect BioCoin. In fact, it gives citizens the opportunity to buy and sell an apple. At the same time, it does not make it possible to use it as a means of payment. But this means that our opportunities will become even more relevant - the possibility of instant exchange of any crypt for biocoin during the payment of goods or services with subsequent accrual and write-off points. That is, the law enables citizens to legally have a crypto. And we give a legal technical possibility of transferring the crypto through the right of claiming a bonus-point in the score and then writing off the score. And all this operation takes place in a few seconds. I talked about this opportunity and showed it here": https://youtu.be/pUc5EdAH-1g

All those equipments for sale are certified and standards-compliant + they will be maintained in time, and the store will develop the biocoin ecosystem and increase token revenue, which will increase its value).  Let's be clear - Biocoin is a tool made to support green economy. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: And why BIO finally resists?  Because our ecosystem is growing. So today we have launched a payment system for biocoins in all offline locations - and it not just a receiption of biocoins as tokens (which was possible before). This is exactly the complete solution of the loyalty system, which integrates both crypto technologies and our developpments. "And everything runs like clockwork through the fact that biocoins turn into points and are canceled", explains with enthousiasm Boris Akimov.  The essence of this: Biocoins are accepted in stores as the right of claim, recorded on the blockchain. The biocoin score is awarded to the right of claim, which is immediately written off and the check is punched. For the buyer it is a quick payment by biocoins. In fact, there is a complex technological process that meets all the requirements of Russian legislation. We promised it and we did it. Without false modesty - the first in the world, and not only in Russia!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Friends! We have released an update to all desktop versions of the BioCoin wallet (Windows, Mac, Linux).  What's new: - when you synchronize your wallet, you no longer need to restart, - earlier, it was possible to stop the work of the purse, now you do not need to restart the purse, - fixed bug with minus display of reward for PoS, - and many more small, pleasant details, about which it is customary to say little. You can see more on this link (https://github.com/Blackithart/biocoin).  Instructions for updating your wallet are here (https://biocoin.help/update_wallet_en.html).  Important: As soon as more than 51% of the coins are in the new version of the wallets, users with old versions of wallets will stop receiving PoS. Update yourself!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: We launched our own merchant application for BioCoin loyalty system partners! Now, even more companies will be able to accept BIO tokens.  You can download the app on Google Play. Merchant is the intermediary between the purse of the buyer and the seller. This is an excellent solution for small businesses that do not integrate into the full-fledged BioCoin loyalty system, but want to accept biocoins safely. When you use the merchant, the direct seller does not have access to the wallet with BIO, which means that the tokens of the business owner will be safe and sound. üôÇ  You can download via this link - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.biocoin.merchant.biocoinmerchant

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The Ministry of Communications has released another bill on cryptocurrencies. üôÇ We consider that it is important to share our opinion on this document. But first some excerpts from this bill:  - Accreditation with the organizers of the ICO will be issued for a period of five years; - The project provides "the duty of the person who issues tokens to use the money received from digital token acquirers only for purposes related to maintaining the ability to fulfill the obligation to redeem digital tokens at a symbolic price".  The project has very little to do with reality. Boris Akimov said he shared RACIB's opinion on this subject: "Life is far from the position of this bill and it will not work that way, but I think it will not be accepted, because in itself, it is very far from other basic bills that are presented to the State Duma."  http://bitcoinist.com/russia-unveils-ico-regulations-ruble

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The Russian Ministry of Agriculture is developing a seed tracking system on the #blockchain!  The share of lower seeds in the Russian agricultural market is 40%. The battle with the "gray" seed market will help detach it.  The blockchain, developed by the Ministry of Agriculture, will allow you to trace the entire way of a seed - from the time of its "birth" to its sale with all certificates. #traceability  In general, one third of all food products in the world is lost or goes to waste for about $ 940 billion rubles per year. Digitalization of the agro-industrial complex allows to reduce these losses and to reduce the number of starving people who are today about 795 million ...  We plan to postpone the examination of our cooperative LavkaLavka in the blockchain. After that, we will be able to help agribusinesses successfully apply technology in order to improve the efficiency and quality of products.

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: At BioCoin, we think that organic farming should be as profitable for the farmer that it is for the others.  This is an exemple of an Indian techie who turned farmer: "I gave up my IBM job to become an organic farmer‚Äîand learned a bitter truth." He discovered that in his country "the price we paid at the local grocer never indicated what the farmer got for growing the crop." And obviously the commercial margins were important for the reseller ...  https://qz.com/1228797/an-indian-techie-turned-farmer-explains-why-agriculture-is-so-unprofitable/

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The Czech businessman has grown tomatoes on heat from mining farms  Co-founder of the Czech currency exchange NakamotoX, entrepreneur Kamil Breiche used the heat of a mining farm for growing vegetables.  In the plans of a businessman to engage in a blockchain-startup on the cultivation of edible crops. To heat the future harvest will use the heat of the miners. To accumulate heat, the project team created the so-called "coin-takers" and placed them in the basement.  Owners of farms have already received the first harvest of tomatoes from a five-acre greenhouse. The debut in the sphere of vegetables was christened "cryptotomates", they are planned to be put up for sale. However, details about the new brand of Camille Breiche are still kept secret.

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: In BFM.ru: Boris Akimov, creator of the cooperative LavkaLavka and the platform BioCoin: "Here is an interesting question: what about the VAT for cryptocurrencies? If it is a property, then all VAT payers will have to pay a VAT for the crypto currency. First, I don't think that it would be a fairly adequate mesure; secondly, there is still a question with the VAT return: if such a paradoxical phenomenon will be, like the export of cryptocurrency abroad as an asset, then will the state come back on it, or VAT? It is unlikely that this will happen under this form, nor accepted, because this question has not been treated yet." https://www.bfm.ru/news/380235

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: "First BIT" and LavkaLavka will provide automatic accounting in the blockchain on the "1C" platform  " "First BIT" has developed a module for counting the movement of tokens in the blockchain, which allows you to get reports for one minute. The module is integrated into the main accounting system "1C". For LavkaLavka and for the first time, the bidirectional integration of the accounting system with the Biocoin platform, as well as with Bitcoin, Etherium and Sibcoin, was realized. Blockchain data is automatically loaded into 1C and transactions are downloaded from 1C to the blockchain. The system has set up reports to answer questions, how many tokens have arrived, what remains and how much. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Today there was an article by Business Insider that ICO projects have to pay up to $ 1 million for listing on stock exchanges.  At BioCoin, we know the inside market and we can say that's not quite true. Our team has so far never met the official or even semi-official statements on these rates. And we are dealing with big market players like Binance, Bittrex (you've seen the matching screen on our channel, the prices do not speak), and Kraken.  "There are many such intermediary proposals, but I'm wary of such a thing - not just in the money sector - and where are the guarantees that it really works?" And it's not just the scammers who hide behind the name of a well-known exchange? " says Boris Akimov, founder and CEO of BioCoin. http://nordic.businessinsider.com/cryptocurrency-exchanges-listing-tokens-cost-fees-ico-2018-3?r=UK&IR=T

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: And it is in "Vetreno" for biocoins that one can engage in unusual diving - historical! - and join the project "The Flooded Shrines of the Mologa Territory". The project participants are exploring the water areas of the Rybinsk Reservoir to recreate the virtual museum of flooded cities and villages of the former Mologa and Rybinsk counties.  For example, 6 days ago, divers discovered an amazing find: an ancient wine cellar ... He was in the estate of the Musin-Pushkin noblemen, which is under water for more than 80 years. You can watch the video: https://tvzvezda.ru/news/vstrane_i_mire/content/201803070139-sh1j.htm

Agro- and gastro-tourists can use all services of the complex for biocoins - http://forestbeach.ru/  In addition, the pleasant can be combined with useful. Very close to the complex there is a whole scattering of the cities of the Golden Ring: Uglich, Yaroslavl, Tutayev, Ustyuzhna. And if you prefer not a history, but zoology, you can visit the eco-farm of the complex: there you will find both South American alpacas, Chinese pigs, Nizhny Novgorod geese, and other farm animals.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Today, one more step has been taken for BioCoin on a technical level!! And it's Boris who explains it:  "BioCoin today signed a contract with Technoserv Consulting ‚Äì the leading developer of loyalty systems in our country. Technoserv has worked with Sberbank and Aeroflot, etc. Technoserv is already doing this for us (following another agreement already signed with him) for the Loyalty System Control Panel, which means that any loyalty system can be connected to our cash register via the control panel, and to transfer bonuses to biocoins and vice versa. A step further has been taken. If the company already uses a loyalty system, it can connect it to our central unit. If the company does not have a loyalty system (and we have 90% potential partners in that case), it can use our loyalty system already connected to our central unit.  This is exactly the kind of loyalty system we have today! We have signed a contract for the transfer to the "BioCoin" Ltd license for the use of New Frontier Loyalty 1.0 for 70 years and with the possibility to connect up to 1000 partners to this software (with the possibility to further extend the network partners).  This includes: customer data management, purchasing management, directory management, communications management, share management for points recognition and cancellation, call management.  This product, together with the Control Panel and our production, will be the platform to which we will systematically connect partners. Our Biocoin in three dimensions: BioCoin's blockchain, New Frontier Loyalty and Control Panel. The more partners there are, the more buyers there are; and the more the need for biocoins is high. You can join the system only if the partner has biocoins in the required quantity. The loyalty system is the foundation of our ecosystem. This is an opportunity to involve hundreds of thousands of jobs and millions of people who are customers of the partners involved in this loyalty system and who are sometimes very far from the crypto world.  BioCoin will be the first crypto asset, actively used by numerous consumers in their daily lives!" #gogreen

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: In the US, they finally thought about the legislative division of tokens into types and freed the utilitarian tokens from regulation by securities laws.  So, in the state of Wyoming a decision came to release the utilitarian tokens from the securities laws. Currently, a new bill has been sent to State Governor Matt Mead for its signature. After the final approval, the Wyoming Legislative Assembly will be the first elected body in the world to clearly define the status of utilitarian tokens.  BIO tokens belong to the same type of tokens - utilitarian. Unlike tokens, which work as securities, these tokens are points that can usually be exchanged for goods and services.  We hope that soon people in Russia will also think about the question of dividing tokens into subtypes and corresponding regulation!

Author: Ukraine2020
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: New article:  BioCoin: Blockchain Based Loyalty Platform for Green Businesses Aims to Disrupt the Wild ICO Market   The idea behind BioCoin is simple. Being basically a blockchain-based loyalty platform it is specifically designed to help eco farmers and other green businesses build strong local and global communities through a system of bonuses and discounts processed on blockchain. Apart from that it offers a slew of other services, like loans for starting farmers.  The platform was devised and built by a large independent cooperative of farmers LavkaLavka, which became the foundation of this new ecosystem. Today they are backed by thousands of consumers, retailers and farmers In Russia, Western Europe and Northern America.  Read more - https://cryptovest.com/news/biocoin-blockchain-based-loyalty-platform-for-green-businesses-aims-to-disrupt-the-wild-ico-market/

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Today, a little later, we will explain all the details on the start of selling tokens to legal entities.  In the meantime, let us remind you that very soon farmers will be able to take loans in biocoins. At the moment, lawyers are working on a legal scheme for issuing cryptocredit.  Boris Akimov gave the German edition of ORF a comment on this: "Well, what farmer will be given a loan in the bank? Therefore, farmers in our cooperative often do not have enough money for machinery and equipment. For them, biocoins are a new opportunity to gain access to money."  https://russian.rt.com/inotv/2018-02-28/ORF-Rossiya-stanovitsya-mirovim-oplotom

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Friends! As Promised, Let's Talk About Selling Tokens To Legal Entities!  On the official website of https://biocoin.bio, we are now setting up a new functionality for the sale and purchase of biocoins. Due to the configuration of some site functionalities, the short time worked incorrectly. At the moment we are launching the possibility of buying and selling biocoins by legal entities. This is necessary for the normal functioning of the loyalty system: a legal entity can officially acquires biocoins, which are then used to charge their customers. And sell them - for exemple to compensate for eventual lost profits. In this case, the possibility of buying and selling biocoins by individuals on the site is not yet possible - but individuals can still do this on stock exchanges.  Sale and purchase rate for legal entities: persons on the site will be guided by the weighted average rate (and turnover) of exchanges and the rate (and turnover) of biocoins within the loyalty system. At the same time, we will not change the rate more than once a day - to avoid the influence of sharp exchange fluctuations on the action of partners of the loyalty system.  Biocoins that will be sold on the site https://biocoin.bio are those that we take in payment for products and those that are bought from the legal entities (persons here).  In fact, we are creating an internal biocoin area for the purchase and sale of biocoins by individuals. Unfortunately, the legal field of Russia does not allow partners of the loyalty system to buy biocoins on stock exchanges yet - as they are outside the zone of right regulation. That is why we have been waiting very much, and are still waiting, for the "Sunrise" platform. We apologize that we misled some of the members of our Community. In the near future, all the functionalities will work in the regular mode.  For us, the main task is to fully launch the loyalty system. It‚Äôs the normal operation of the entire system and the growth in the number of partners that are the key to the growth of biocoin users and the growing demand for biocoins. We want the system to grow and scale steadily!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The founder of the agricultural cooperative LavkaLavka @BorisAkimov gave a detailed comment on the launch of the loyalty system and talked about plans for the development of BioCoin:  ‚ÄúFriends! We are doing a serious work on entering large exchanges. At the same time, it is extremely important for us to create a foundation for sustainable growth of biocoin, and not to arrange instant ‚Äúpampas‚Äù and speculative leaps - such things are easily done by others, but why? It is important for us to build an ecosystem with its stability and "sustainability".  To do this, you need to do the most important thing - to create a broad business platform that unites hundreds and thousands of businesses - first in Russia, and then in the World.  To do this: a) everything is very clearly done from a legal point of view, b) to give convenient technological solutions to partners. This is what we are doing! At the moment, a juridical person can not officially buy or sell biocoins on stock exchanges - as they are not yet legitimate in Russia. The company must conclude an agreement and transfer money by bank transfer. And this is possible with biocoin! Not yet at the stock exchange but through the acquisition or sale of biocoins from one entity to another.  And this is a real breakthrough! There is not a single crypto-asset in Russia that can be officially and legally acquired. And that means one more thing - Biocoin is a legal window for companies of the crypto community. As soon as the partners begin to connect in large numbers - this will immediately impact the course on the exchanges.  In addition, in the next six months, a legitimate exchange will appear in the legal field of the Russian Federation.  In general, we are working on a plan to create a large project - the BioCoin Platform. And there will be big exchanges and stuff. But we definitely will not sacrifice for the sake of a momentary HYIP (High-Yield Investment Program) the fundamental principles - the legality and sustainability of the entire Platform.‚Äù  Then patience and integrity will be rewarded. Besides, work and patience are two mains qualities of a real farmer, isn‚Äôt it?

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: And even corn on blockchain is possible!  Former Mexican president Vicente Fox thinks that the democratization of data used in blockchain will be quite useful for the country, especially for its agriculture. Fox gave the main agricultural product, corn, as an example. Mexico had always been lacking corn raised inside the country so that they constantly had to purchase more than 40 billion dollars worth of corn from neighbors. With that local farmers had accumulated enough experience and observations on how to improve this crop production. Fox proposes to put all of the accumulated knowledge and skills into the blockchain for public access. He thinks that farmers would be able to start ‚Äúyellow revolution‚Äù jointly.  Too bad they did not have blockchain during Khrushev‚Äôs time:)

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: How are the unsold tokens going to be destroyed after the ICO?  Thanks to our community for drawing our attention towards an imperfect existing scheme of coin destruction. Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Dear friends! Partners of BioCoin loyalty system have already been enjoying their Maslenitsa pancakes. And we have to say it has been done in a very cultural way! You can certainly join this process:  On February 15th LavkaLavka in Sivzev Vrazhek will host a dinner with the chief of the ‚ÄúKultura‚Äù newspaper Mikhail Budaragin. The start is at 19:30.   The dinner‚Äôs theme is ‚ÄúTea?Coffee?‚Äù. These are the two non-alcoholic beverages that fit well in Russian literature. Who was drinking lots of tea and waking up by lunch time drank a cup of strong coffee, and what happened to them?  There are two menus available to choose from: Option 1: Traditional dinner 1. Roast beef salad with seasonal roots 2. Buckwheat flour pancakes and rye malt with milk mushroom in sour cream 3. Red salmon with pumpkin pur√©e and fennel 4. Honey cake with cowberry brew.  Option 2 Vegetarian/Lean:  1. Vinaigrette type salad (Russian beetroot salad) 2. Lean pancakes with milk mushrooms 3. Seasonal vegetables ragout 4. Honey cake with cowberry brew  The cost of the lecture and dinner is 2,500 rubles per person.  Please join us. It will be very interesting and of course, quite tasty.  Details available via phone calls at 8(917)5846874  You can purchase tickets at LavkaLavka.com and in our stores (you can find the store addresses on our website).

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: And again about #foodtech today. This time we are going to talk about seafood on blockchain from Intelüêü  Intel creates a platform of distributed registry with an open initial code for fishing industry.  This solution called Sawtooth Lake allows to control the seafood  extraction, increases the precision and reliability of the accounting, starting from the moment when seafood is caught. It also helps to maintain adherence to the storage conditions in accordance with the sanitary requirements.  IT giant has already demonstrated loT sensors ( for internet of things) that gather information about the owner, location, temperature, humidity, product movement etc. All of this data gets into blockchain.   It is possible to see a sample of traceability and reporting in the chain of delivery due to the power of a distributed registry of Sawtooth Lake on a blockchain-startup website Provenance. This startup became the main initiator of this development  provenance.sawtooth.me

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: We have already shared the info on how blockchain can help the environment. What agricultural issues can distributed registry technology solve?#agritech  1. Security of food Consumers are getting more demanding in relation to food consumption. As this tendency grows, large food chains will have no choice but use blockchain to provide for production transparency and food products quality.  2. Low effectiveness of the delivery chains due to information asymmetry.  Using blockchain will result in delivery chain becoming  more democratic and effective. As a result there will be less product removal and higher rewards for the farmers.  3. Forgery of food products. Blockchain will solve this issue by increasing the transparency of delivery for each sold product. Retailers and farmers can just scan the barcode on each of the products using their smartphones and learn about the origins of the products they buy.  4. Land registration Blockchain can make all the land registration types more effective and available ensuring the full transparency in the system. In Chechnya, by the way, Rosreestr (the State registry) is being transferred onto blockchain.  5. Subsidy payments Distribution and provision of subsidy can become more transparent using blockchain which will result in targeted payment of subsidy and decrease in the number of theft.

Body: IBM will start fishing in Vietnam. #foodtech  IBM has developed a Bluemix platform that is being actively implemented in Vietnam. Tracking of the distribution chain is supported by the use of radio frequency identification (RFID) that allows to gather information pertaining to the place type and date of catch, temperature which the products are held at during the time of delivery, all in real time.  The cost of around 10 cents for such sensor is lost amongst the total annual catch volume of $2 billion. It is suggested that sensors are going to be attached to big expensive types of fish.

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: How do they use drones in #agritech?  For example, Gamaya is a Swiss electronic doctor for agricultural crops.  The system allows to significantly reduce the time for a field overview, making an independent conclusion on fluctuation of soil indicators for various crops.  The program analyses the data from images taken by drones and based on the knowledge of necessary required amount of chemicals, soil particularities as well as the crop that grows on it, makes a conclusion about potential plant diseases and the reasons for the disease.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: We get the same questions over and over in our https://t.me/biocoinchat_ru. Questions like why Bio token is traded at an exchange before the end of the ICO. Why is the coin cheaper at the exchange than on the official site? Where to buy? Which other exchanges will have the token?  Here are answers to these questions by Boris Akimov:  ‚ÄúDear friends, this was done on purpose. Usually ICO process looks like this: users leave their requests for tokens and pay 100%, and then after the ICO is over, coins are delivered to these users.  We put the token into the circulation before the beginning of the ICO so that our counter agents could receive their payments in Bio. Our asset is a ‚Äúlive‚Äù instrument which is used in real business. First transactions with BioCoin happened yet in August way before the ICO.  Farmers and other businessmen were already using our biocoins in the fall of 2017. So it would have been strange to oppose the circulation of our coin at the exchanges. Since it was being used, it should have been traded as well.  Regarding trading of Bio at Yobit, Livecoin and Profit exchanges. These exchanges have low volume of Bio and it is not interesting for a serious investor. If you want to purchase small amount of coins, then you can certainly do that at an exchange. If you want volume, then it is worth buying it off our website biocoin.bio.  And a little about our plans. We are actively talking to Bittrex, and planning to have Bio listed at that exchange after the ICO. We also have Binance and Kraken listings in our plans‚Äù.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: And the most important thing is that our coin has organic demand. As soon as the loyalty system would be fully launched, all our partners and businesses will go to exchanges to purchase coins there. Without coins they would not be able to launch loyalty system in their businesses. And the more businesses and consumers using biocoins in their daily purchases, the higher demand for coins at exchanges.  After the loyalty system reaches a good number of real working partners, then BioCoin exchange rate will directly reflect the success and multiplicity of the loyalty system. The base of BioCoin is an understandable economic activity and not just mere exchange rate numbers with reality being interpreted by speculations and imaginations. Go green!

Body: Currently it is possible to buy regular standard farmers products such as milk, meats vegetables, fruits in LavkaLavka. However, scientists agree that with the earth population continuing to grow farmers will have to find new ecologic solutions. And then insects and seaweed will become the main products. They have a high quality protein, vitamins and amino acids that humans need so much. Their production is absolutely harmless for the environment. Seaweed has more protein than meat (a small piece of spirulina has more protein and iron than it the same volume of beef fat)  There are already some companies that are catching on this trend for the new ecologic food. For example, an Italian company EntoCube grows edible insects, and a company called Bugsolutely makes pasta from insects. #foodtech

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: A computer with a virus immunity was developed by a company OKB SAPR and now, they have created a secure biominer on its base. It will be available for purchase quite soon. And it will be sold with crypto currencies already on it (biocoins, Sib chervonets, and maybe 2 more coins of choice).  When the biominer is turned into the power and is connected to the Internet, it will perform POS mining when it comes to BioCoin, and for SibCoin it will have an installed master node. So such biominer will earn up to 5% annually from the balance in BioCoins and for Chervonets it will earn around 28% annually.

Author: xottabikrus

It is also a device with a virus immunity. OKB SAPR has developed it just like a projected microcomputer without the basis architectural exposure of all the modern gadgets.  It will be possible to buy this device quite soon. It will be interesting for those who invest in biocoins and SIB chervonets more than 100,000 rubles. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: From the beginning we have been building our BioCoin blockchain platform within the framework of the Russian Law and great experts worked on preparation of a legal opinion for BioCoin. That is why we came in great spirits and rather inspired. As a result, our attorney Michail Uspensky all alone (in the absence of the defendant (Roskomnadzor) and attorneys for the other websites and with my silent support from the audience), clearly answered dozen of questions from the prosecutor.  It looked like the judge had no doubt we were right though he decided to examine all the proof in more details and set a new hearing for February 1 at 2 pm. We will continue to stand our ground and interests of our crypto society!  P.S. the status of the plaintiff in the petition is stated in a peculiar way:  Lefortovo inter-district prosecutor in the interests of undefined group of people including minors.

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Today we are going to tell you about another interesting crypto project (and a promising token for potential investments) that helps developing #agritech.  VeChain project is one of the leading blockchain platforms for product information tracking. It has already been implemented in such industries as production of luxury items, food products and agriculture. Now with more details. VeChain uses blockchain and cloud services to help with the certification for the agricultural products. The project also helps minimize negative effect of the production on the environment. Using cloud based services and technology of internet of things participants can receive actual and exact information about quantity and quality of sowing.  Blockchain is being used in logistics as well.  Project has its own cryptocurrency, the token is called VEN. It is used to pay for services and products of VeChain.  VEN is now on the 20th place in the CoinMarketCap rating with capitalization of almost $2.25 billion. During the last week the price of the coin went up by 26.5%.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: It is the first time that wheat delivery from Russia to Turkey was paid for with crypto currency!  In December, Prime Shipping Foundation company delivered 3,000 tons of wheat from Rostov-na-Donu to a Turkish city of Samsun. The deal was made in bitcoins, the head of the company Ivan Vikukov told Bloomberg. The deal was hedged with the help of futures on Bitcoin at the CME exchange.  Prime Shipping Foundation is a joint venture of Gibraltar company Quorum Capital and a charter broker Interchart. Both mother companies‚Äô owners are of Russian decent though all registered outside of Russia.  Let‚Äôs remind you that in December, farmer Akimov purchased a cow and pigs from farmer Potcheptsov for 42,000 biocoins. So, soon we will get to wheat as well!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Crypto currencies are not going to be banned in Russia. This is a conclusion that could be made after reading the draft law ‚ÄúOn digital financial assets‚Äù by the Ministry of Finance. The agency is planning to regulate crypto currencies turnover, ICO and mining. We are just a little concerned by the provision that unqualified investors would only be able to purchase tokens for not more than 50,000 rubles within the framework of one ICO.  Exchanges of crypto currencies and tokens, as proposed by the draft law, are allowed to be made to other crypto currencies, rubles and foreign currencies only through exchanges registered in Russia. So we are expecting a listing of BioCoin on domestic exchange:)

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Another story about ‚Äúreasonable‚Äù mining, strawberry and #agritech  They are going to build a farm with two purposes in Primorsky Region, for a simultaneous strawberry cultivation as well as crypto currency mining. Fruity farm CoinBerry would have a building complex including a high-tech all-year-round greenhouse that will be heated using its own solar system energy. The choice of strawberry itself, as explained by the company, is due to the fact that this is a very tasty and valuable berry and there is a huge deficit of it during offseason in Primoriye.  ‚ÄúOur project CoinBerry we have united three independent processes such as greenhouse strawberry cultivation, greenhouse heating by the power generated by the crypto farm, and  generating the power for the whole ecosystem from a solar power system. Synergy of such solutions allows to minimize risks and expenses‚Äù, commented Oleg Kotel‚Äônikov, a representative of the startup.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: And we are going to talk about #agritech again. Though this time it is not an ICO-project, but a fully functioning product. A Californian start-up Blue River Technology has developed agricultural robots for weeding that can differentiate between good crops and weeds and get rid of weeds via target spraying of herbicide.  The first company‚Äôs robot called See & Spray takes 30 milliseconds to tell weeds apart.  That is ten times faster than a blink of a human eye.  The robot would allow farmers not only to decrease the volume of used pesticides to spray crops by about 10 times, but also to buy regular seeds that cost about 75% less.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Now we are going to tell you about a miner-farmer in all of its senses. Make a note of this eco-example.üí™üèª  His name is Bruce Hardy. This Canadian miner found a way to direct the used energy to benefit nature. He has been mining bitcoin for two years now and it during this time he has built 30 bitcoin-farms. And these farms are real.  This miner used a standard cooling system though recently he started directing the heat from the processors to grow plants. Now the heat from the bitcoin mining goes to edible products.  By pressing the button he pumps water enriched with nitrates to water basil, lettuce and barley.  This way energy is being used in a more economical way, and the heat is transmitted to agricultural needs. Bitcoin investors from China and Australia have already shown great interest in this technology of the Canadian businessman.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: It was not in vain that we told you about the miner-farmer earlier. The consequences of non-ecological mining could be rather destructive for the environment.  Emissions of carbon dioxide related to mining of bitcoin grew to 20 million tons in a year.  This has been published by an analytical blog Digiconomist. Based on their data, people and companies that mine the most popular crypto currency spend on that more electric power than the whole New Zealand.  Based on experts‚Äô evaluation, the total profits from bitcoin mining come up to 11 billion dollars a year, though cost of energy related to that total more than 2 billion. Analysts state that based on that even if bitcoin‚Äôs price falls down in half, bitcoin mining would stay profitable.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The World Wildlife Fund (WWF) uses blockchain technology to trace tuna to help fight against illegal fishing.  Right after each fish is caught it will be marked with RFID tag on a boat which will allow the plant manufacturer to trace it by downloading the data into the blockchain base. Then once the fish is processed it receives a QR code connected with a unique entry in the database to help trace the product on its way to the consumer. #foodtech

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: They are using Artificial Intelligence at a poultry farm. Soon they will get to blockchain;)  Group of companies ‚ÄúDamate‚Äù in February will launch the biggest poultry processing plant in Europe that uses Artificial Intelligence. The plant is located in Penza Region, and its production capacity comes to 155 thousand tons of ready products a year. Artificial intelligence will serve as sanitary entry check for the employees. As you know, each employee has to pass sanitary processing of hands and shoes before entering the plant, and each time they go through a set of standard actions. A camera installed in that area will recognize employees by their faces and scan their movements. Up until employees go through the whole set of necessary steps set by the instructions on sanitary processing, the plant entry would remain closed for them. Meanwhile, there is nobody next to the video camera, so that there is no human error and the employee compliance with all the steps required for the sanitary processing is guaranteed.  #agritech

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: They are using blockchain for grain deliveries in Australia! And that is the largest agricultural sector of the country (29.8% from the total agricultural income) #agritech  BlockGrain is the first Australian agricultural platform that provides automatization to the grain delivery chain using NEW-blockchain technology. This platform allows unhindered solutions for contracts between farmers, grain brokers, consumers and wholesalers of logistics services. With that, BlockGrain is a computer software built for creation of contracts for product deliveries as well as product transportation.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: China and the USA have concluded first trade deal on blockchain! And this has happened in #agritech sector!  Chinese company Shandong Bohi Industry used blockchain platform Easy Trading Connect (ETC) for the first time to sell soy beans to an American agricultural company Louis Dreyfus.  Banks including ING, Societe General and ABN Amro took part in that deal. This delivery of soya from China to the US became the ‚Äúfirst full trading transaction in the agricultural sector that used blockchain platform.‚Äù  It is worth mentioning that ETC platform allows for faster and easier transactions. In particular, it digitalizes contracts such as purchase-sale agreements, letters of credit and reduces the need for legal support of a deal.  Based on the developers group statement, technology makes transactions five times faster.

It is the taste that we lost, forgot in all these supermarkets where everything is made in Israel or China.‚Äù  It is very nice to hear something like that. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: A ‚Äúgreen‚Äù crypto revolution is awaiting to happen in 2018, states Wired publisher. This will happen due to implementation of blockchain technology in companies that support ecologic principles of production.  As a consequence new crypto currencies are expected to appear that will stimulate investments into such companies as well as encourage purchases of natural products. Using blockchain technology, delivery chains from different economy sectors could be combined into one global database.  Such level of transparency would allow to define specific ecologic benefits such as ecologically clean fuel, natural proteins or renewable energy sources, and turn them into market products.  For example, there are such crypto currencies as GENERcoin, EnergyCoib and SolarCoin. The latter crypto currency can be earned by showing ‚Äúgreen‚Äù certificates of using renewable solar energy and spend on purchases of real products.  BioCoin is also going to facilitate such trend development in Russia and in the world.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: We continue to introduce agritech to you.  Chinese company ZhongAn Technology created a service GoGo Chicken. Farmers use it to write data about growing chicken into the database that is based on blockchain. Buyers can get that info through a smart phone application (will have information about it later!).   It works based on the following principle: a small device that is attached to the hen‚Äôs leg identifies the location of the hen and the number of steps. Food data for the hen is also written into the base. And recently added to the service technology of face recognition allows customers to watch over the purchased hen still at a farm through a smart phone application.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Yesterday we posted news about an interview with that Bali hotel founder, and now here is the interview itself ( Translated from Telegra.ph)   Why does a business need BioCoin?  We received a lot of questions after the news that a Bali hotel Bondalem Beach Club accepts biocoins for payments. We answered these question in BioCoin chat. And then decided to interview the founder of the hotel Maxim Demenchuk. Before dealing with crypto currencies he had been a trader for 15 years, working with currencies, shares, bonds. So he knows enough about investments. Maxim explained why BioCoin can be useful for a business.  -Why did you decide that it is useful to have payments in BioCoin?  I like new trends, new things. It is possibly a  thrust for illiquid assets with high growth potential. ;-) BioCoin is not your true crypto currency which makes it even more appealing. I have read that there had been attempts to create similar loyalty systems in other countries though they did not work. BioCoin in spite of some flows is developing and if it keeps up the growth rate then in 2 years, if the government will allow it, the project will scale.  Additionally, it is easier to explain to any regular user how a loyalty system works than hold a lecture about crypto currencies, mining and etc.  We all deal with loyalty systems, store cards, coupons on a daily basis. What is then BooCoin for any business? It is one part of marketing, advertising.  -What does a hotel get from participation in the BioCoin loyalty system? Advertisement, advertisement, advertisement. It does not cost anything, and time will show its effectiveness. I advise to use this marketing step to all my acquaintance from different businesses. However, when they hear the words ‚Äúcrypto currency‚Äù, they picture the MMM pyramid. I guess some had participated back then:) The project attracts partners, we in essence are creating a ‚Äúclosed club that is open to new participants‚Äù. We want to believe that everyone who becomes a partner will fulfill their obligations to accept and credit loyalty points BioCoin. It is true that there are difficulties with payments in crypto currencies in the RF. However, if a partner announced that he would accept it, then go ahead and accept, or leave the partnership. It is difficult now to pay for products and services in crypto currencies in Indonesia as well.  If BioCoin is successful in scaling, I am sure it will benefit everyone. What is so bad that instead of numerous cards of Lenta, Perekrestok, Diksi, Baxettle, Pyaterochka, Mvideo, Eldorado etc, I will just hold one card with points.  The competition will certainly partially switch from price segment to service quality evaluation segment.  A little about Bondalem Beach Club:  The hotel opened in 2013. There are 4 luxury bungalows and 2 double-occupancy suites. There is an ongoing construction of a stand alone villa with 11 double occupancy suites on the hotel‚Äôs territory.  It will be possible to rent suites separately or the whole villa at once for large groups, corporate events, fitness/yoga tours, trainings. Launch time is set to May/June.  Payments in Biocoins are accepted directly at the time of booking or during the stay at the hotel restaurants. Guests receive 10% bonuses in biocoins from money spent on lodgings and 5% for food purchases at the restaurants.

Body: As much as would like to think that way, we understand that BioCoin is not the only token in your wallet üòé  That is why we have gathered some wise and valuable recommendations for investors of crypto currencies from famous world analysts.  Here are the top-10 recommendations:  1. All the markets are cyclical. Do not be afraid of market rollbacks and collapses as during these moments you can potentially get the biggest profits.  2. Be very careful and concerned with gurus and experts that offer you trading schemes promising immediate generation of profits.   3. The best way to have intraday trades of crypto currencies is NONE, it just does not exist.  4. Do not think that if you managed to earn big profits with crypto currencies, you can easily enter other financial markets with similar results.  More than 95% of traders loose money. Just remember, this is a game of agreements and it gets manipulated. Keep to the ways that work for you.  5. Crypto markets work 24 hours a day, 7 dats a week, 365 days a year. It is impossible to catch every trend, so if you missed one, please do not worry, there is ALWAYS going to be another one.  6. If you earned large profits that can completely change your life, do not do ANYTHING in the next 30 days.  7. Do not create daily goal profit indicators; instead focus on long-term effectiveness indicators in reaching your set goals.  8. Do not trade before announcements of big and important news as it is impossible to estimate the market reaction to that.  9. You will DEFINITELY make mistakes. Do not be too hard on yourself when it happens however try not to step on the same rake.  10. Do not invest into token that you have not researched thoroughly. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: There are news in the mass media about the expected Telegram ICO. The most famous reporters are taking info from a published White paper (originality of it has not been confirmed). We also reviewed the document. So, the new platform TON would be working on a PoS (Proof-of-Stake) basis. This is the system Vitalik Buterin wants to switch Ethereum to. And that is exactly how BioCoin works.  Let us explain what it all means (careful, it is going to be a long read!!!).  Proof-of-Work and Proof-of-Stake  are two most famous algorithm consensuses with crypto currencies. They offer different structure mechanisms to proof work done.  PoW mechanism provides an ability for the nodes to check that a miner (a node in that role that is adding a new block into the blockchain) has physically done the calculations. This process includes an attempt to find hash block title (part of the blockchain that has a link to the previous block and summed up data of transactions included within) that would in its data match the current difficulty level. PoW quickly turned into a monster burning electricity to make profits from mining. In 2012 the total combined power of Bitcoin network was already higher in performance than the most powerful supercomputer in the world, and the first alternative, Proof of Stake has appeared on the horizon.  In Proof-of-Stake approach nodes also try to hash data in search for a result lower than a defined data though the difficulty in this case is spread proportionally in accordance with the balance of a given node. In other words, it is spread in accordance with the number of coins (tokens) on a user‚Äôs balance. Thus, a node with a higher balance has more chances to generate a new block.

I will try to describe everything in simple words.  Biocoin crypto currency came to existence as a result of an ICO by a company called LavkaLavka. What kind of a company is that? This is a cooperative, or a society of farmers and consumers in other words that are brought together to interact directly excluding intermediaries that are there only to make money on resales. ICO or token sales are performed under the scrutiny by the government , though with the support of the government as far as the development of a legislative framework. That means the token is legal on the territory of the Russian Federation.  What we get as a result is a real company, not a start-up on papers, and an acknowledgement of the token by the state. It means that the whole thing is not going to just disappear in one moment, and the price of the token depends on the demand and the project‚Äôs team work.  What can we use Biocoins for?  1. Currently, biocoins are used for settlements of payments between the owners and companies that accept biocoins. The list of these companies is growing day by day which is a result of efficient work of the team. There are more than 50 companies that accept biocoins such as farms, stores that sells farmers products, famous equipment distributor MyHoreca (customers get biocoins as a reward for registering and then for each purchase), Eldoradio will accept biocoins as payments for the commercials, UAZ factory is also on that list. As we can see, the list is rather long, so companies are recognizing crypto currencies. 2. The second direction where we can use this coin is the clients‚Äô loyalty systems, which would award coins for completed purchases from partners that joined the network. 3. As we can see, this is not just a speculative coin but a real coin that can be used to pay for products and services.  Where and how to buy BioCoin.  The first option to purchase coins is through the ICO that is being held now until February 18, 2018. How to buy biocoins on the site: 1. Go to https://biocoin.bio/en/invest 2. Fill in a simple form: number of coins you want to purchase, e-mail, payment method (with crypto currency, electronic money or bank card) and indicate your wallet number that you need to create beforehand (info on how to set up your wallet is detailed later in the article). 3. Accept the conditions and pay and then wait for biocoins to be credited to your account.  Second option is to purchase these coins through a currency exchange, for example, LiveCoin exchange.  And option number three is to start accepting biocoins as payments for your products and services.  Where to keep BioCoin crypto currency and which wallet to choose.  In reality, everything depends on the ways you are going to be using the coins for. If you just want to hold on to your coins and wait for their growth, then it is better to have your wallet on the desktop computer.  If you are planning to trade the coins, then it is better to have the wallet on the exchange. If you want to pay for products and services, then obviously a mobile phone would be the place to set your wallet. A full list of options could be found here: https://wallet.biocoin.help/en/  To summarize we can say that this is a very interesting project, and in my opinion, it has great potential and after the ICO the coins will grow in price. This is a practice for any coin that has real team and activity. So, I have purchased some coins myself, and recommend you to take a look at it and think for yourself.

Body: Let‚Äôs say for example, in the USA an artificial intelligence can be used to weed fields.  Agricultural robot was invented in a company called FarmWise. The robot can find and pull weeds from a field. The whole process does not require an operator, the robot can work autonomously. First, the robot uses the recognizing objects system to identify weeds in the field and then using mechanical manipulators pulls these weeds from the ground. During this process of weeding the robot also collects data on the growing crops. The only parameter to input into the robot before the start of the work are the GPS coordinates of the field borders so that the robot works in that field only.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Here is what is on Boris‚Äôs mind:  ‚ÄúLife always has a place for marvelous things. Or odd. I am now somewhere in between. I am sitting on an ocean shore (Bali sea to be exact), my kids are near me splashing in the water and so am I, why not. Here is black volcanic sand, weather of +26C, there is nobody on the beach, just fishermen waiting to catch their barracudas and tuna which you can immediately fry right here at a local restaurant. There are palm trees with coconuts, rambutans, salas(salaks, not fish) and other fruits with some hard to pronounce names.  Shots hold local rice distillates, glasses are served with non-local wine. There is also quite decent (in all senses) Bali massage. Water cruises with dolphins, finishing, waterfalls. The hotel offers a pool right in front of a personal bungalow and sea 30 meters from it. So, you know even without me about the fairytale Bali. What you do know not is that all of that (from bungalow, pool and massage to barracuda, dolphins, waterfalls and distillates) can now be purchased for biocoins. Yeah, you heard that right.  The same farmers biocoins that are spreading fast not only in Russia but all over the world! I just could not pass by such news that now you can pay with biocoins in Bali and thus, I went there with an inspection. And the inspection is going on so nicely. For a day I was silent, just walked, swam, sniffed, chewed, drank. And now I can assure you that it is right and biocoins are accepted in Bali. And now when you are going to LavkaLavka (and not only) and receive biocoins as bonuses for a purchase of farmers salami by Alexander Potcheptsov, for example, or for chicken soup by Andrey Ovchinnikov at Dmitry Akishin restaurants made by Elena Savchuk, you can then celebrate the end of the year by such Bali trip. Do it just by using the accumulated biocoins.  Here is another way. You bought biocoins on the site biocoin.bio or at an exchange. The exchange rate changed during few months and you followed my footsteps much cheaper than using rubles.  This is a long one. Though I had to explain everything to myself and you. Body: What should you expect from crypto currency in 2018?  There are a lot of trends, so we put together the main ones:  1. Growth of trading volume for bitcoin futures. So far the volume of bitcoin futures is not so big, however Nasdaq and Tokyo exchange are planning to start trading bitcoin futures in the first half of 2018.  2. Issue of futures by other crypto currencies.  What is quite interesting is the fact that according to some unofficial data, other crypto currencies, such as Ethereum, Litecoin and Ripple, are planning to issue futures in 2018.  3. Stricter industry regulations  One of the main markets have been and still is South Korea. It is expected that South Korea is preparing regulations for the crypto currency exchanges.  4. Opening of new ETF Regarding the other hemisphere, there is still a question on whether SEC will allow the creation and launch of ETFs( exchange traded funds).  5. BioCoin has conquered the worldüòà. There it is all simple and we promise rapid growth:)

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: So, guys? We did not visit bat‚Äôka ( President Lukoshenko) in vain, did we? BioCoin has been invited to become first crypto residents here!! https://decenter.org/p/140-belarus-loves-cryptocurrency-rus  A decree legalizing mining and crypto currencies has been signed into law in Belarus.  It sets framework for the use of crypto currencies and tokens, along with introducing certain tax breaks for crypto currencies transactions. Resident legal entities and non residents of Belarus have the right to own tokens, create and place their own blockchain based assets through the residents of the High Technologies Park; they also can transact only through crypto exchanges and special operators.  Besides that, individuals have a right to perform mining, buy, exchange and sell tokens for Belarus currency, foreign currency, electronic money, and also give tokens as gifts and pass them on through inheritance. It is important to note that before January 1 2023 profits from various transactions with tokens is not subject to tax and mining is not defined as business activity.

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: What will be growing next year?  From: Crypto Analyst  Hello everyone! I have read the news that most investors are expecting faster asset growth in 2018 than in 2017 (I am one of them.)  Let‚Äôs look for example at the percentage growth of 15 crypto currencies during the current year (currencies that traded at an exchange starting January 1):  NEO ‚Äì 35,714%; NEM ‚Äì15,245%; Stratis ‚Äì 13,985%; BitShares ‚Äì 10,128%; Ethereum ‚Äì 9,337%; Stellar 8,882%; Ripple ‚Äì 8,755%; Dash ‚Äì 8,321%; Lisk - 7,514%; Litecoin ‚Äì 6,622%; Waves ‚Äì 6,364%; Ethereum Classic 3,426%; Monero ‚Äì 2,360%; Bitcoin ‚Äì 2,155%; ZCash 1,105%.  Could it happen again in 2018? Quite possibly. It is possible BitCoin will not grow as rapidly though there are other interesting crypto currencies that could show their potential.  Many projects that went for ICO this year planned in their Road Maps that the start of the working versions would happen in 2018 (different times of the year for different projects.) We will be able to analyze what happened with these projects and whether they managed their tasks and goals. If they really start their projects, then we could see their fast growth on the exchange.  However for now we have time to look through all these projects and find the best ones with the highest growth potential. There is still a chance to earn money on them, moreover, we are just at the beginning of the upward growth movement.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Yesterday we had a very important day! Though it was actually the day before but we are just getting to share the news. BioCoin was created to be an effective instrument for revival of local business and development of local societies and territories. And in that it is easily integrated into all of the projects of LavkaLavka as well as our Territories Development Fund Big Land. In 2015 we went to Teriberka that after the ‚ÄúLeviathan‚Äù movie became the quintessence of the Russian sadness and hopelessness. A lot has been told about our activities there.  At first our civic engagement on our knees brought us to the festival of territory development. And something started to move slowly, turn around here. Teriberka came alive. We gained experience, the festival turned into a constantly working group that united us with architects, sociologists, economists, Urbanists and other concerned and caring civil activists. We started to work on methodologies of steady territories development, indices of steady development. A center of expertise for rural and suburban territories development had began to develop there  within the frames of the ANO Big Land.  And there was that important day. Big Land received an official order from the administration of Murmansk region to create a master plan for Teriberka development.  This will be first Russian experience of creating a full development plan of rural territories that will be based on principles of steady development.  And we are not talking about architecture or urban design. To be specific, it is not just about that. We firstly will work on social, economic, ecological aspects of harmonious development of the space. That is about a man, active local society, social environment, business, culture, nature. Urban design and architecture will be there as well but only as adequate answers to substantial requests based on main direction development. Our goal is not only to create mechanisms of steady development of Teriberka, but also to create in the Big Land a working methodology that will help bringing alive the most distant (and not so) places and regions of Russia.  Teriberka is not our only direction, we have already started our work in the Jewish Autonomous Region (last place in the rating of development of the Russian regions). And few more interesting territories are currently under our development.  We live in the largest country in the world. However, it is just a phrase from a textbook for all of us. Turkish shores, European capital cities and beaches of Thailand become closer to us than almost any of the regions of our own country. We at Big Land wish that we as citizens of Russia, learn how to use in full something that undeniably belongs to us, our great space around us. ¬´Our country‚Äù should stop being just some semantic abstraction. We need to give back the true meaning to the word ‚Äúours‚Äù. ‚ÄúOurs‚Äù means that we have all the rights to use our own country in all its incredible and beautiful dimensions, however simultaneously we bear responsibility for this country. Any right and property is first of all a responsibility. So, the goal of the Big Land is to create steady mechanisms that will revive the responsibility for the environment around us. Once we have that responsibility then everything else will come along.  Big Land, LavkaLavka, BioCoin, biologists, sociologists, economists are all going to Teriberka on January 11th. They are going there to take everything that had been done and talked about for the past few years and create a well built and working mechanism of territories development that could be used and replicated all around the country.  So, it was an important day. It is time to return this land to us.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ALdCIzsoO9s

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: I took examples you provided in previous post:  Purchase for 950 rub gave you 190 bio, at max value of 20% this gives the rate of 950*0.2/190 = 1 rub/bio, the lower estimate is 950*0.05/190=0.25 rub/bio , so the actual rate is somewhere between. This is also proven by Yobit exchange rates: BIO is currently at 0.85 rub/bio and falling. I don't want to tell this is bad btw, a good chance to get cheap bios ) But still this is in contradiction with ICO at 1.95 rub/bio.

Body: Guys from Forklog helped and are still helping us with the ICO. And we have developed great relations with them during this time. And whatever is happening with the founder of Forklog, Anatoly Kaplan, in Ukraine is just a shame! Anatoly, we are with you! ‚Äú During the search SBU( Security Service of Ukraine) officials seized few devices with crypto currencies kept on them, a notebook and other personal belongings of Anatoly Kaplan.  While doing that, one official of SBU made few attempts to transfer bitcoins to his wallet right during the search and in response to that Kaplan‚Äôs attorney called the police and notified them about a supposed theft. After that attempts to transfer bitcoins stopped. However, just the next day after the search all ETH currency that was held on Kaplan‚Äôs Ethereum crypto wallet were transferred to a newly created wallet that supposedly belonged to the officials of SBU‚Äù.  https://forklog.com/sluzhba-bezopasnosti-ukrainy-izyala-u-osnovatelya-forklog-kriptovalyuty-i-vynesla-vsyu-tehniku-iz-ofisa/

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: So here it is. There is this most famous charitable fund ‚ÄúPodari zhizn‚Äù. Today we went to Peredelkino near Moscow where we met with Gregory Mazmanyanz, the Fund‚Äôs director. Here at the territory of a former beautiful manor the fund will build a boarding house for sick kids and their mothers. The issue is that between their chemo therapy sessions at Moscow hospitals kids go home for a few weeks though their homes could be thousand kilometers away. This causes mothers to look for some temporary lodgings in Moscow which could also be quite costly and not so affordable. ‚ÄúPodari zhizn‚Äù rents dozens of apartments in Moscow for such families. Now the fund has received ownership to this former manor and this boarding house would be build for kids and mothers.  How can farmers and BioCoin help these kids and this fund? Here is how: We have agreed that farmers of the cooperative will send products to the cafe at this boarding house, and chefs from LavkaLavka will cook in that cafe.  With that there will be a garden where products will be grown for cafe and for sales through cooperative to raise additional money for the boarding house. There will also offer working places for mothers in the cafe and the garden to distract them a little from the reality and also to give an opportunity to make some additional money.  And also our farmers and chefs will come there to hold master classes and educational programs for kids and adults. Biocoin application could be set up in such a way to make a donation to the boarding house of ‚ÄúPodari Zhizn‚Äù from each transaction. Simultaneously, the Fund will spread it on their channels and in communications with other benefactors that it accepts donations for the boarding house and kids healthy farmers food in biocoins.  BioCoin and ‚ÄúPodari Zhizn‚Äù will become full partners in 2018 and will start collecting funds for this joint project.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The world market for the ‚Äúgreen‚Äù bonds has grown almost to 300 billion dollars and is continuing to grow faster each year. Green securities are those connected with projects that benefit the environment. The main demand for green bonds and green financing comes from socially responsible businessmen. So, such bonds are purchased by businesses that Biocoin actually appeals to, businesses that are integrating into the platform. The demand growth for such securities shows the fast speed of development of the green ideas and ideas of responsible businesses within the business environment.  These are the drivers of the green economy today:  -ratification of the Paris agreement of 2015 - increased awareness of possible financial losses if green strategy is not integrated - increased awareness of the fact that green growth stimulates economic growth - commitment of the UN to the achievement of goals for steady development -positive changes in perception and treatment of the environment -need for diversification -green securities could lower the overall risks of the portfolio - changes in the national and regional laws and regulations  Here is a very peculiar research on this topic you can read: http://perspectives.eiu.com/financial-services/green-finance-making-transition-climate-resilient-future-0/infographic/green-finance-making-transition-climate-resilient-future?utm_campaign=EP2017%20-%20Email%2047%20-%20NEW%20-%20HTML%20-%2024112017&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua

From the press-release: ‚ÄúTechnoserv Consulting‚Äù is implementing their own developed solution ‚ÄúTSK:loyalty program‚Äù for the farmers cooperative LavkaLavka with hundreds of partners in the Russian market as well as worldwide. The key specialty of the project is that instead of regular virtual points each client receives international crypto tokens of Biocoin company.  ‚ÄúTechnoserv Consulting‚Äù offers full range of services on automation of business processes of midsize and large companies. As of today, the company has implemented over 300 projects to integrate IT systems of different levels and purposes. List of clients includes Aeroflot, Sberbank, RZD (Russian Railroads) and others. ‚ÄúTechnoserv Consulting‚Äù is part of ‚ÄúTechnoserv‚Äù, one of the biggest Russian systems integrator that has been working in Russia, CIS countries and Europe. In 2016 the financial turnover of the group of companies ‚ÄúTechnoserv‚Äù was over 52.44 billion rubles.  More details are coming later!

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: What do Bio and a tiger have in common?  WWF and BioCoin. Tigers are the end of the food chain. If a tiger has a place to live and food to eat, that means there is a balance in the nature. It means there are sufficient number of boars, tops and roots for boars to eat, and plenty of fields and forests for tops and roots to grow. The whole eco-system is stable and well balanced! BioCoin and WWF were meant to become friends. We want to give each customer within our BIO loyalty system an ability to make micro-donations to WWF from each transaction.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Polugar( the old recipe Russian bread wine) has joined Biocoin. And now they are even organizing a learning feast in LavkaLavka! On December 14 LavkaLavka in Sytinsky invites everybody to a  dinner with ‚ÄúPolugar‚Äù. The founders of the private distillery ‚ÄúRodionov and sons‚Äù will talk about the traditional bread wine.  In the Czarist Russia the monopoly for distillation caused disappearance of the bread wine, however today the interest for has been revived. Not all the old recipes are lost; they now serve as a basis for the modern production technology. Anyone who desires to learn the history of bread wine and also taste it LavkaLavka is inviting for a lecture ‚ÄúHistory of Russian vodka from XVI century through nowadays‚Äù on December 14. And that is of course not just a plain lecture, but a tasting of 9 types of bread wine ‚ÄúPolugar‚Äù re-created by the historian of the Russian vodka Boris Rodionov in the private distillery ‚ÄúRodionov and sons‚Äù based on recipes dated back to XVIII and XIX centuries.  After an interesting and useful discussion guests will be invited to a dinner by the LavkaLavka cafe‚Äôs chef Dmitry Savkin. We are waiting for you on December 14 at 18:30 at Plotnikov pereulok, 19/38, building 2.  The start of the lecture is scheduled at 19:00. Seats are limited.  https://lavkalavka.com/page/ujin-pod-polugar

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Here are the results of the contest for creation of the stickers for the official Telegram channel and the VK group.  1 place- Ilona Loginova, https://vk.com/topic-156156808_36228693?post=19,  gets the main prize-10,000 BIO  2nd place -Marina Kusti, https://vk.com/topic-156156808_36228693?post=40, gets 5,000 BIO  3rd place -Sergey Krasil‚Äônikov, https://vk.com/topic-156156808_36228693?post=46, gets 3,000 BIO  For those who did win we still have a small prize for participation- you each will get 500 BIO.  To claim your prize you need to send  your BIO wallet number in a message to the official VK group (https://vk.com/biocoin_ru)  Hooray! Congratulations to the winners!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin as a marker, trigger and symbol. Here is Jaime Oliver, our colleague in ‚Äúgreen fight‚Äù talks about why organic food is so important and not only for the health of people but for the steady development of the planet. Though not just food, but any product or service we use daily affects our planet. Every day we shape our future. And the world we are going to be living in tomorrow depends on the responsible choices we make today. BioCoin should make this process much easier as our goal is to bring the socially-responsible green businesses together into one platform. Then it will be quite easy for a consumer, who wants future where humanity lives in harmony with the environment and the world preserves its diversity, to make his choices. BioCoin is a live instruction for responsible consumption. Read Oliver! He is quite inspiring.  https://www.jamieoliver.com/news-and-features/features/vote-for-organic-food/

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: How can anyone start mining in 2 minutes? How can one start mining and not waste additional energy? How to mine and not to harm the planet? How to make your crypto wallet safer?  This week we will have our first pilot version of BIOminer! And we are in talks with Chinese about starting mass production. It is a simple device that turns any power plug into crypto gadget.  There is a Biocoin wallet inside the device that has a WiFi internet connection so that the device is constantly online, is always I n the Bio network and gets the rewards. With all that, your refrigerator, TV, notebook etc all work through that BIOminer as this device works as an adapter as well. On one side you can plug your home appliance, on the other side you plug BIOminer into the electric outlet. And then everything works!  We will reveal the test version quite soon and will describe all the details of our invention! Biomining to everyone!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: In this message BioCoin team answered TOP 5 frequently asked questions:  1. How long does it take to credit BIO to the wallet?  -The actual time frame for fiat is from 5 minutes to 3 working days, fo crypto currency it will be 5-7 minutes. The length of the term also depends on the commission announced by user and how fast the payment is processed. Legal term for receiving BioCoin is 7 days.  2. Which exchanges are currently trading BIO?  -At this moment, BIO is traded at Yobit, LiveCoin, Profit.  3. Will BIO appear at https://coinmarketcap.com? -Yes, please follow the official news.  4. What is a safer and more convenient way to keep BIO?  -Every user chooses his/hers own way of keeping BIO. If you want to keep it in a Web wallet, then you need to switch on 2-factor authentication. If you choose personal computer, then make sure to save the reserve copy of wallet.dat file in a few places. If you want to use mobile application, do not forget to save the backup words.  5. What is the principle used for dispatching BIO? Coins from the main wallet get transferred to other wallets, connected with various nodes (fiat, crypto currency, Telegram-bot and others), from which they are dispatched to the buyers of biocoins.   Here is a link to download wallets: https://wallet.biocoin.help/
