Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Here is the project of the farmers hub by LavkaLavka which is already being built at the border of the Tula and Moscow regions. The farmers‚Äô market, cafe and shop for canning fruits and vegetables are already open. Hub‚Äôs opening is taking place in spring 2018.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Last week there were few new companies that joined BioCoin platform. Here they are! ‚ÄúPolugar‚Äù is rye distillate based on all recipes (http://www.polugar.ru/polugar), Institute for development of cooperation that formulates new concepts of cooperation in countryside (http://ru.calameo.com/read/005091573904c2c707b46), men‚Äôs studio ‚ÄúZhemchugov‚Äù in Ekaterinburg (http://ekb.egosuit.ru/), ‚ÄúAgroservice‚Äù company that produces natural yogurts from real farmers milk (http://xn--b1agdif7b.xn--p1ai/), ‚ÄúOrganic Farming‚Äù farm (https://www.facebook.com/Organic-Farming-293161704529459/) ‚Äì they grow organic vegetables in Ukraine. And more-a learning site for beginner investors in crypto currencies called Crypto-Laba (https://crypto-laba.ru/) and ‚ÄúKorobka‚Äù, a company that delivers fruits from Thailand directly to your home (www.korobka.biz). Soon, they will reward and accept biocoins!   First product of our Tula hub! After the market and kalach bakery, now we have a working canning shop. We have picked and fermented a lot of different things there. Here is the first cabbage from there prepared using Delicatessen Chef Shishkin‚Äôs recipe. Complete success!      And here is one more ‚Äúexplosive‚Äù. We are starting a new business: with the product range such as farmer‚Äôs canned vegetable, cheeses, sausages, groceries and drinks we are hitting the networks under the name of Farmers‚Äô cooperative LavkaLavka. And to tell you more about this process of best products -#bestproductsinrussia- getting into the retail networks, we will have a videoblog. The whole life starting from the field, farmers to buyers of the retail networks and shelves. Soon to be on the shelf, soon to be in the stomach, soon to be in a broadcast!    Who are the heroes of our days? ‚ÄúIf you don‚Äôt have lots of Russian rubles, you can exchange your bitcoins to rubles and go to LavkaLavka and buy a pie for rubles. You can certainly do that, however you cannot come to LavkaLavka and pay with bitcoins, as this is the constitutional principle,‚Äù said vice minister Moiseev.‚Äù https://lenta.ru/news/2017/12/06/cryptominfin/

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Official BioCoin news: ICO of BioCoin has been extended till the start of Voskhod platform.  Shortly: Expert appraisal of the demand for LavkaLavka BioCoin crypto assets purchases at the Voskhod platform is more than 100 million biocoins. BioCoin ICO is this being extended until February 18. Starting December 1, 2017, cost of BioCoin will amount to 1.90 rubles. Starting February 1, 2018, cost will be 2.50 rubles. On February 27 site BioCoin.bio will host market place where partners of the BioCoin loyalty program will be able to place purchase orders for biocoins, and those, who bought biocoins during the ICO will be able to sell them.  Details: after series of lengthy consultation sessions with the non-commercial partnership RTS, a decision has been reached to extend the ICO of LavkaLavka until February 18, 2018. Partners have agreed on that due to the desire to reach the regulatory ‚Äúsandbox‚Äù of the Bank of Russia. Another reason is the support of interest of the investors  that will receive additional opportunity to purchase more than 100 mln biocoins in case biocoin hits the legal Russian trade platform Voskhod. At the moment, more than 9 mln dollars have been raised from the ICO. Changes to the time frame will not affect the road map of the project in any way.  On September 22, 2017, ‚ÄúNP RTS‚Äù association and farmers cooperative LavkLavka reached an agreement for the strategic partnership and holding of ICO with subsequent token circulation on Voskhod platform.  Shortly before the date of the ICO start the government of the RF and The Bank of Russia received an assignment from the President of the RF to create a structure on the basis of the Central Bank for ¬´approbation of innovative financial technologies, products and services‚Äù in order to identify additional risks. Voskhod had expressed a desire to participate in the work of the ‚Äúregulatory sandbox.‚Äù  After going though all the necessary procedures in accordance with the testing regulations set by regulatory and supervisory authorities, Voskhod platform is going to be ready to place the electronic assets of the farmers‚Äô cooperative LavkaLavka. The expert appraisal of the demand for purchases of crypto assets by LavkaLavka on Voskhod platform is now more than 100 million.  Currently, BioCoin is traded on a few international platforms and their number will increase in December. LavkaLavka‚Äôs loyalty system is working in the test mode and Biocoins are already accepted. The fully operational system should start working in winter 2017-2018. Based on the first stage of the ICO, LavkaLavka is continuing to develop the sales system of the farmers products, which is reflected in the ICO prospectus. In the nearest time there will be a start of a new project that will allow farmers from the cooperative to sell large volumes of products though new wholesale sales channels of LavkaLavka where Biocoin would be actively used.  After regular round of consultations this week with RTS and the Central Bank the new time frame for the ICO has become clear and understandable. ICO will finish on February 18, Sunday, at 18:00 Moscow time.  To celebrate that (also to note that February 18th is the last day for Maslenitsa, Russian festival), we will hold a special dinner at the LavkaLavka restaurant in Moscow ( Petrovka, 21) and BioCoin team and LavkaLavka want to invite all the bites of biocoins!!  Please plan your time and come, the dinner will be quite tasty! There also be an opportunity to have personal interaction with the team and discuss all interesting and important questions. We will watch the last minutes of the ICO together! Starting December 1, 2017, cost of BioCoin will amount to 1.90 rubles. Starting February 1, 2018, cost will be 2.50 rubles. The ICO will end on February 18, 2018. On February 27 site BioCoin.bio will host market place where partners of the BioCoin loyalty program will be able to place purchase orders for biocoins, and those, who bought biocoins during the ICO will be able to sell them.   Market place at biocoin.bio and entrance to the Voskhod platform, within the frames of the regulatory sandbox, will become important steps that will allow partners of the Biocoin platform, operating under Russian Law, to start working within the platform without obstacles.

Land, farmers, crypto currencies and no mining please! POS forever! ‚ÄúEvery year the value of bitcoin kept increasing by ten times on average. Starting from 0.1 dollar in 2010 till 1 dollar in 2011, then to 10 dollars in 2012, then to 100 dollars in 2013. Then the growth slowed down and the cost started increasing the times in every2 years: to 1000 dollars in 2015, to 10000 in 2017, 100,000 in 2019 and 1,000,000 dollars in 2021. From this moment on it made no sense to show BitCoin price in dollars as nobody used dollars anymore and central banks stopped printing money. Today, wealth exists in two main forms such as land and crypto currency.  https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/1lfobc/i_am_a_timetraveler_from_the_future_here_to_beg/   German Klimenko and BioCoin: ‚Äú Everything that we get to do with crypto currencies is help Boris Akimov, the director of the BioCoin project‚Äù, said Klimenko.  http://cryptofans.ru/news/obshhestvo/german_klimenko_rasskazal_chto_daljok_ot_kriptovaljut.html   LavkaLavka. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Dear BioCoin community:   We would like to sincerely thank you all for your support and faith in our project. We‚Äôre truly happy BioCoin has a big and strong community. Without you, phase one of our tokensale wouldn‚Äôt have been successful.   We‚Äôre deeply disturbed by the seeming lack of understanding between BioCoin and our community. With this statement, we would like to mitigate all disagreements by answering three crucial questions asked by the community:   1. Why did BioCoin slow down the tokensale? 2. Why is prolongation good? 3. How can I sell or supply goods for BioCoin right now?   1. Why did BioCoin slow down the tokensale?   It‚Äôs not a secret that BioCoin is Russia‚Äôs first legal ICO. We planned to hold it with platform Voskhod and signed a respective agreement with the RTS.   Voskhod itself was not ready for launch on time, so we had to kick off the tokensale by our own efforts. Voskhod stated on November 1st that it would join the tokensale later. After that, BioCoin became the country‚Äôs first token to receive legal assessment and recognition as a legitimate asset. The legal conclusion was developed by expert lawyers headed by Elina Sidorenko, the head of Russia‚Äôs parliamentary working group for cryptocurrencies.   The second important step was to put the asset to a legally compliant exchange service in Russia. The project‚Äôs team and lots of investors all agreed that a legal cryptoasset at a legal cryptoplatform was what we all looked for.   We believe that we must keep our promises, so all this time our team was negotiating with Voskhod, the Russian Central Bank, and the RTS.   The regulators do try to describe cryptocurrencies and other digital assets. For that purpose, they do researches and develop mechanisms including so-called ‚Äòsandbox‚Äô where legal frameworks for cryptocurrencies and ICO in Russia will be developed. BioCoin will be an active player in this sandbox.   Our cooperation with the Central Bank will not only let us hold the first legal tokensale in Russia but also make BIO a legitimate exchange asset. At the moment, it‚Äôs possible only if they‚Äôre traded at Voskhod as it is the only place to have received the Central Bank‚Äôs permission to trade cryptoassets for the moment.   Therefore, the prolongation of the tokensale was a necessary step to (a) keep our word given to the community that we‚Äôll make our token a legal exchange asset; and (b) help the Central Bank develop an approach towards regulation of cryptocurrencies and ICO.    2. Why is prolongation good?   Thanks to extending our tokensale we hope to enable BIO trading at Voskhod. We‚Äôll also keep our promise to make our token a legitimate exchange asset. You shouldn‚Äôt forget that many tokensale contributors joined the campaign for that very reason.   Prolonging the tokensale will let us keep biocoin holders safe as BIO will be legally regulated. The price of tokens acutely responses to introduction of regulation in different jurisdictions. Once it‚Äôs understood that Russia has finalized its regulatory framework using the practical case of BioCoin among other things, it will reflect positively on our token‚Äôs price.   We also heed the Central Bank‚Äôs stance towards cryptocurrencies, tokens, and ICO. We do want to help them create a beneficial legal environment for us and other companies, so we‚Äôre willing to take part in their ‚Äòsandbox.‚Äô That‚Äôs how we help make cryptocurrencies, tokens, and their trading understandable and regulated. That‚Äôs a good and reasonable thing in the long run. Not just for BioCoin, but for all of us.   We also want to ensure steadily high demand for BIO. Due to the prolongation of our tokensale, the number of tokens held by users will only grow. One may safely assume that they won‚Äôt be just means of storage but also be actively used in the entire BioCoin ecosystem as a way to provide bonuses or buy goods/services from LavkaLavka and our partners in Russia and abroad. Finally, together with international platform RCN we make it possible to issue loans to farmers with BIO tokens.     Prolongation of the tokensale will only expand the ecosystem, its capabilities and potential. It will let us implement our roadmap in an extended form: we have already launched some new projects that hadn‚Äôt been thoroughly formulated in the beginning, but will make BioCoin much stronger. For instance, it‚Äôs the opportunity to exchange any cryptocurrency or token for goods / services of BioCoin‚Äôs partnership network.  Any issuer of their own token or cryptocoin will be able to build in our exchange module into their wallet to exchange their tokens for BioCoins on the fly. Thus, the demand for BioCoins gains new traction. We‚Äôll soon describe this and other new projects in greater detail, so please stay tuned.   3. How can I sell or supply goods for BioCoin right now?   We understand that, regardless of all our plans and the actual implementation of BioCoin in the existing services of LavkaLavka and our partners, there are some buyers that could feel unsatisfied because of the extension of the ICO. To that end, we remind that BioCoin isn‚Äôt a coin from some uncertain future, like ‚Äúhere we hold and ICO, then create an infrastructure, and then the coins will be used.‚Äù Our ecosystem has been working for a long while now: it‚Äôs the entire infrastructure of LavkaLavka, it‚Äôs over 200 farms, it‚Äôs stores, restaurants, production facilities, it‚Äôs our partners who connect to BioCoin. BIO doesn‚Äôt live on its own: our blockchain solutions have been integrated in a real business, in an existing infrastructure. Farmers and lots of our partners are using BioCoins as we speak. They‚Äôve been doing it for a while. Thousands of wallets with coins, transactions, exchange trading, it‚Äôs all been there for some time now. It‚Äôs all real. It‚Äôs not tomorrow, it‚Äôs today. You can always sell biocoins or exchange them for farm goods or other goods / services.   We‚Äôre confident that the prolongation of our ICO is directly related to the growth of BIO ecosystem, which is the guarantee for the coin‚Äôs future success. It‚Äôs not a mere speculative instrument, it‚Äôs a token directly connected to real businesses. It‚Äôs down to earth in the least figurative sense of the word. We don‚Äôt have to make exuberant statements to make biocoin buyers like us. We believe that a real business is a living thing. It cannot exist as a dogma. It has to develop, evolve, and grow.  Those who can adapt are those who win. That‚Äôs why those who count on rapid growth will only win because BioCoin is deliberately building our business on the principles of steady growth. They are the cornerstone of development of business and the demand for biocoins.  A few moths ago we couldn‚Äôt anticipate anything that happened to us afterwards. Together, we‚Äôre building a new world, an unknown one maybe, but it will be the way we create it.   Best regards, Boris Akimov and the BioCoin team

As Boris Akimov said, ‚ÄúWe know how the world where people live in harmony with the environment should function. Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: BioCoin is planning a tour in the countries of Asia. We are planning meetings with investors and businesses that have already joined BIO platform or are about to join. It will include Singapore, Indonesia, China. One of the particular special features of this expedition is that it‚Äôs organized and executed solely for biocoins. This tour is a perfect example that platform and tokens are starting to work and not only in Russia. The flight was arranged for biocoins by our platform partner, BPO agency (www.bpo.travel), accommodations in Bali are organized by yet another BioCoin platform partner, hotel Bondalem Beach Club (http://bondalembeachclub.com/). In China we will hold a presentation of BioCoin and our Far Eastern farming invest-project with the participation of our Chinese BIO partner Fusion Group and with support of API (agency for attraction of investments), founded by the Ministry of Far East development. And much more. We will share all the details of the tour and biocoin life in Asia here. And for some inspiration we are taking a small particle of our new partner, a box of amazing Polugar (bread wine). Together with our colleagues, masters of distillation processes, we have developed a new way of biocoin integration with real business. Though we can talk about it next time. For now-Asia, here we come on December 2!

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: BioCoin first of all unites all the green and socially responsible businesses. Our goal is to let people   in their daily expenditures to invest  in things that make our world better. Things that preserve world‚Äôs diversity, both social, biological and ecological. That is why we are so proud of the fact that BioCoin cooperates with projects like Americans from Ben &Jerry‚Äôs. Here are some very right and inspiring words about the project and the life position that is very close to ours: ‚ÄúWhy are leaders that inspire people go out of their comfort zones and help others become successful? Because instead of concentrating on their own award and staying indifferent to how they influence others, great motivators aim to give as more opportunities to other people and make their contribution to the society. For example, company Ben & Jerry‚Äôs makes pastry at a Greyston Bakery, that is located in a very poor Bronx neighborhood. They hire people who cannot find jobs. Their slogan ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt hire people to make pastries. We bake pastries to hire people‚Äù is an excellent example of a vision of a true leader. Compared to this, leaders without empathy, are not able to see how they can influence others.‚Äù

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: So, here we are right now, sitting at the Karelian farmer and tar extractor (imagine, they still exist) and are discussing the traditional shortage of money.  So, which bank would loan money to a tar extractor? This sounds just like a joke, whereas he certainly needs a loan as he needs to expand the manufacture.  There are more and more orders as demand is growing, who would have thought, for wooden boats for Lake Onega. And right then there is an update from Forklog about encouraging news on BioCoin as a credit instrument. From the very start we have envisioned  and planned our platform as an opportunity for farmers and small businesses to attract inexpensive resources for development. And so there is, a union that allows us to use a serious financial infrastructure, and do so at an international level.  ‚ÄúRCN Network is built on the base of smart-contracts and native token RCN.  Every loan within the RCN system happens with participation of a guarantor that is responsible for valuation and an adequate loan repayment. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: When we say that BioCoin was created for development of the green economy, what do we really mean by that?  Here it is, for example, the US Ministry of Agriculture held their regular populations census (it is held every 5 years.) The final report has not been published yet, however here are some interesting numbers surfacing right before publication:  -average age of an ordinary American farmer is getting closer to 60 years,  -from 1992 to 2012, 250 thousand small and mid-size farms closed and 35 thousand new large ones opened; land consolidation seems to be in progress,  However!!! And that is BioCoin‚Äôs world:  - number of young (under 35 years) farmers has been growing for the second time in the last 100 years,  - from 2007 though 2012, there have been almost 2400 new young farmers entering the market though about 100 thousand older farmers aged 45-54 left the market,  -in some states there has been over 20% growth in the number of first time farmers (California, South Dakota, Nebraska)  -69% of young farmers went to college; that is a much higher percentage than the overall indicator for the total country‚Äôs population,  - young farmers are well-educated, they leave cities, they become first time farmers, they have not been raised in farmers‚Äô families,  -young farmers are not inclined to use pesticides/herbicides, they are oriented for the organic products,   -they start with small farms (50 acres) and they usually extend their territory while becoming more experienced,  - lack of start up capital and access to funding for equipment purchases are main factors thwarting progress.  Youthfulness, ecology, future. This is all about BioCoin.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: We are getting ready to hit retail chains! You come to a supermarket, buy something and receive biocoins. Bio platform does not accept just anyone. We choose only the best products that were manufactured under the principles of care and responsible attitude towards the environment, ecologically and socially. These are organic products made with respect for the farmers and our planet, ecology and local traditions. First product to hit the retail chains and our BioCoin Platform would be our beloved Polugar (dear teetotalers, please forgive us.)  This drink is produced at the family distillery of Boris Rodionov. The product comprises best traditions of wine distillery of 18-19th centuries. There is a QR code under the bottle sticker. You buy the bottle, come home, drink it, scan the QR code and get your Bio! And this is just the beginning! We are in talks with more than 20 natural food producers that are ready to buy biocoins and place QR codes on their packages to advertise their own products, to motivate secondary sales(to consumers) and to verify the products‚Äô origin. So! Bottoms up! Cheers!

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: BioCoin News!  Good morning! A little bit about what we do. The interview is in Russian, but here are some extracts:  Biocoin is the so called farmers‚Äô crypto currency that you have created. Were you not satisfied with ruble? -Small business always gets financing leftovers, though it is more vulnerable to the problems of cash gap and insufficient investment funds. That is why we had this idea to create an additional tool to support typical for LavkaLavka cooperative small rural businessman. We did not invent a bicycle, we created BioCoin platform and a method to expand it basing it on the existing BitCoin technology.  Our BioCoin wallet has a built in function of micro-crediting. Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  Hooray!!This day has come! BioCoin is the first legal token of the country. Expert group under the direction of Elina Sidorenko, a director of the interagency group of the State Duma for risk valuations of the crypto currency circulation, who is providing legal support to BioCoin, has prepared a legal opinion. Here it is! The legal opinion for the BioCoin.  https://biocoin.bio/files/conclusion_ru.pdf   Here is a big big discussion. It is all about BioCoins, crypto currencies, venture capital investments and fate of Motherland. Boris Akimov says: ‚Äú As a citizen and a human being, I am interested in crypto currency not just as a way to increase capital, but as a way for the local community to get self-organized. I think this is the path towards a stable development. A thought that a local (wherever it could be) society could set their own rules of the game, create a new tool based on trust that could be transferred from hands to hands and proves this trust, makes me thrilled. For example, we spoke to a local official in Tatarstan about the fact that there is a region that desperately needs a bridge. He is proposing to have a state-private partnership where they( state) will contribute part of the funds, and local citizens will contribute the second part. They will build that needed bridge for themselves, and tokens could be used for free rides through the bridge (or sell them to others.) People can start building bridges, roads, gas stations, schools, kindergartens, hair salons.  This is a ‚Äúreplacement‚Äù for the state. We have an initiative with RAKIB( Russian Association of Crypto Currency and Blockchain), it reminds me of an idea for a blockchain zemstvo ( local government.) Before the revolution there were zemstva in Russia that opened schools and hospitals and learned to manage the funds so that they do not disappear.  Georgy L‚Äôvov that announces the ‚ÄúAll Russian Zemstvo Help Union for the sick and wounded soldiers‚Äù became the director of the Temporary Government because he had created the biggest non commercial and non-governmental organization that took place the role of state to an extent. Although he could not manage the suppressions of riots and mobilization of troops and these functions should be left with the state government. It is not clear whether a blockchain can deal with the army and fleet, as it can manage everything else.   https://incrussia.ru/understand/inc-talks-ico-vs-venchurnye-investitsii-kak-my-budem-delat-biznes-investirovat-i-zhit-v-mire-blokchejna/

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: BioCoin News!  We have new members in our marketing team!! A new and a more powerful team is here! And here is a new and daring offer! We are proposing something new within the new bounty program. Who can write something beautiful about biocoin being a scam? We will pay you 100 bio! We truly think that unfortunately or not, in the world we live in any news is good news. As long as there is no silence! So, we pay for bad news as well. There are plenty of good posts anyway. So, for each beautiful and high quality post about scam (it has to be funny) we will pay with Bio-thanks! Scam is in the house!  Let‚Äôs use our imagination a little. If BioCoin is merchandise, and someone (a payer of the VAT) is exporting it, VAT has to be returned.  BioCoin! First legal!  Legal opinion has been prepared by expert group under the direction of Elina Sidorenko, a director of the interagency group of the State Duma for risk valuations of the crypto currency circulation.  In accordance with the opinion biocoin is part of the bonus program of LavkaLavka cooperative similarly to miles that Aeroflot bonus program participants get and have legal status confirmed by the court.  Experts noted that biocoins are not token-shares as there is no need to invest in them, or invest into the cooperative‚Äôs capital, and the holders of biocoins do not receive profits.  It is also noted that as a result of participation in this program, client and company only get rights but not obligations.  https://takiedela.ru/news/2017/11/22/legalnyi-token/   More legal...  https://forklog.com/biosoin-kooperativa-lavkalavka-priznali-legalnym-tokenom/   Our LavkaLavka restaurant‚Äôs chef Elena Savchuk has been named the best chef of the year!! Hooray!!! Farmers and biocoins have been cheering for you!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: BioCoin News!  We have been bombarded by news and publications today.  ‚Äú...Token, as explained by Akimov, gives more guarantee than promises that investors usually rely on in regular crowdfunding projects. Though with blockchain help you can issue tokens for pretty much anything. Akimov explained that his interest in blockchain is more as in the method of self-organization of the local communities. Technologies will allow such communities to become less dependent on the state government and make their own rules and create their own tools.  People can build bridges, roads, gas stations, schools, kindergartens, hair salons all by themselves. If that is not a substitute for the state, it is at the very least huge help to it.‚Äù  https://incrussia.ru/news/akimov-o-rossii-i-blokchejne/   There will be an interesting event organized by United Traders this Saturday- https://utconf.ru. BioCoin team will also be there. It is expected that Boris Akimov (BioCoin) and Anatoly Radchenko (UT) will have a joint announcement  about the going forward cooperation at the conference.  As Boris Akimov said, ‚ÄúWe know how the world where people live in harmony with the environment should function. We know how to grow organic products, how to make something very tasteful from these products( hooray, yesterday the chef LavkaLavka was named Chef of the year.) We know how to build local communities and develop territories with the help of local food. We do know what to do so that all the values that are important to us would get additional impulses for development with the help of blockchain and biocoin. However, there is one ‚Äúbut‚Äù! Farmers are not trained for trading and have no experience with exchanges, so that support of few thousand traders from UT would be very timely and helpful for us! We recently sat and talked with Anatoly Radchenko in LavkaLavka restaurant and agreed on many topics. We both definitely like good food, great drinks and like to change the world around us!‚Äù So, it looks like a union of eco farmers, responsible gastronomers and traders would be generating some great and interesting results! Please, come to the conference!   BIO is going to Paris! On December 15 at 19:30 there will be a meet-up ‚ÄúBiocoin: first eco crypto currency.‚Äù Our French partner Agostinho Pereira will host this event. The place, Group One Point, has been chosen quite successfully as this is the place that holds the most important events in the new technologies field. Please register for the event and receive the latest news.  http://meetu.ps/e/DsmJl/CvCfD/d   Consulting company Miras has joined BioCoin blockchain platform. This company is an official partner of companies like ELMA (business processes management system), Action Digital (magazines ‚ÄúCEO‚Äù and 112 electronic publications), City Business School (new generation business school). That means it will soon be possible to get professional consulting for biocoins!  http://miras.su/services   And more- we have Eldoradio joining us! They deal with professional production of audio and video commercials, now for BioCoin as well! Audio starting 3000 Bio, Video starting 10000 Bio.   http://eldoradio.ru/   And more partners of BioCoin! Russian-Italian company Samaref (Pavel Kibirev and Alexey Shurkin) that manufactures equipment for HoReCa. They have cheese and meat dry aging fridges, and much more.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Today Boris Akimov (quite soon) will be talking at a blockchain marathon held by the Russian Association of crypto currency and blockchain in Moscow. Akimov will explain why blockchain and crypto currency are very powerful tool for the development of local communities. Here is a great article on that topic: https://www.google.ru/amp/www.forbes.ru/amp/310117  At the conference of RAKIB association where BioCoin is a member. The growth of the usage of crypto currency has been increasing twice as fast compared to the original growth of Internet. If it stays the same, there will be 3 billion crypto wallets by 2030.      Foreign press is talking about BioCoin being the first Russian legal token.  https://www.btcsoul.com/noticias/biocoin-e-reconhecido-como-token-legal/   We have secured a very promising partnership with blockchain project RCN Network. RCN is a dedicated credit network protocol and their expertise will help us develop a superior framework for lending and borrowing resources within the platform.  From the very beginning we have envisioned BioCoin platform as an instrument facilitating small businesses and farmers. Lending support is of course key here. BioCoin‚Äôs partnership with RCN will allow us create a robust framework for lending/borrowing BIO to support a budding green business and keep the generated value within the network. https://biocoin.bio/en/blog/biocoin-combines-efforts-with-rcn-network-to-better-assist-green-businesses-worldwide    The story of dramatic ‚Äúlove‚Äù of BioCoin and Voskhod and RTS is still on! The expert appraisal of the demand for crypto assets by LavkaLavka on Voskhod platform is more than 100 million BioCoin! Based on the consulting sessions that were held this week between the farmers‚Äô cooperative LavkaLavka and ‚ÄúNP RTS‚Äù Association, it was decided to extend the ICO of LavkaLavka. Partners have agreed to this because of the desire to get to the ‚Äúsandbox‚Äù of the Bank of Russia. And also because of the inquiries from the investors. The change of the time line is not going to affect the project‚Äôs road map.  Here is the official statement by ‚ÄúNP RTS‚Äù and LavkaLavka on this matter: on September 22, 2017,  ‚ÄúNP RTS‚Äù Association and farmers cooperative LavkaLavka signed an agreement for the strategic partnership and holding of an ICO with a subsequent token circulation on Voskhod platform.  Shortly before the date of the ICO start the government of the RF and The Bank of Russia received an assignment from the President of the RF to create a structure on the basis of the Central Bank for ¬´approbation of innovative financial technologies, products and services‚Äù in order to identify additional risks. Voskhod had expressed a desire to participate in the work of the ‚Äúregulatory sandbox.‚Äù  After going though all the necessary procedures in accordance with the testing regulations set by regulatory and supervisory authorities, Voskhod platform is going to be ready to place the electronic assets of the farmers‚Äô cooperative LavkaLavka. The expert appraisal of the demand for purchases of crypto assets by LavkaLavka on Voskhod platform is now more than 100 million.  At this moment the collections from the ICO have gone over 9 million dollars; BioCoin is traded on a few international platforms and their number will increase in December. LavkaLavka‚Äôs loyalty system is working in the test mode and Biocoins are already accepted. The fully operational system should start working in winter 2017-2018.  Based on the first stage of the ICO, LavkaLavka is continuing to develop the sales system of the farmers products, which is reflected in the ICO prospectus. In the nearest time there will be a start of a new project that will allow farmers from the cooperative to sell large volumes of products though new wholesale sales channels of LavkaLavka where Biocoin would be actively used. Boris Akimov, the founder of the farmers cooperative LavkaLavka, states: ‚ÄúWe think that in the interest of current and future investors we need to let the original plan be implemented and enter the first legal electronic platform in Russia. Few days ago BioCoin was named the first legal token in the country by the expert group under the direction of Elina Sidorenko. To have that supported by the entrance to the first legal electronic platform in Russia would be quite right. Secondly, there are investors that are interested in such configuration where BioCoin is traded on Voskhod platform. I think that for additional 100 million biocoins we should really make the effort. This would also give us an opportunity to come closer to our goal of 15 million dollars. And third, the stance of the Central Bank is very important for us, we are actively ready to participate in the ‚Äúsandbox‚Äù. And since we have been invited over there, we will certainly take the invitation.‚Äù LavkaLavka will announce details on the extension of the time line for the ICO and realization of new projects in the nearest days after rounds of consultations with the ‚ÄúNP RTS‚Äù Association and the Central Bank. Besides that, all the BioCoin buyers will be invited to vote and chose one of the schedules for the ICO time line extension.  https://biocoin.bio/ru/blog/ico-lavkalavka-prodleno-do-zapuska-voshoda

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  Dear users,  unfortunately there has been a lot of issues with the mobile Biocoin wallet that lead to a very unpleasant situation. This caused a lot of negativity. What has truly happened?  1 - The malfunction was caused by the DoS attack on the whole BioCoin network after which the server for the mobile wallet has started working incorrectly. Though this got fixed by us.  2 - The malfunction happened due to the fault of our server‚Äôs hoster; the main reason for the malfunction of the server‚Äôs part did not depend on our team because https://meduza.io/feature/2017/11/09/v-evrope-byli-nedostupny-tysyachi-saytov-v-rossii-legli-sayty-vedomostey-i-znak-com-chto-eto-bylo  When the server was turned on, we discovered that our database was damaged and we directed all of our efforts to fix that issue and restore the server. We managed to restore and restart the server. After that we recompiled the application with the new parameters and data, but at that point Google Play changes the applications policy conditions. At this moment our developers are changing the application to correspond to the changes in the policy of Google Play. BioCoin team apologizes for the inconveniences caused by all that.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  It is not just the GDP! So, really, how does the world work? Here is the map of the world that reflects the international happiness index. The ‚Äúhappiest‚Äù places are marked in light-green color, the less ‚Äúhappy‚Äù ones are marked with brown color. In 2006 USA was on 150th place, Russia was on 172nd. In 2016, USA was on 108th, Russia on 116th. You can find a lot of interesting things at the following link: http://happyplanetindex.org/   Our fund, Big Land, created for development of the agricultural territories, is planning to use the methodology of the Happiness Index and other indices of stable development in order to create standard evaluation marks for Russian regions development. And we are going to use Biocoin as a platform to launch main tools for development of territories and local communities.  Soon we are going to talk about a launch of a platform for crowd investing and a model for blockchain zemstv (lands) which we are working on together with RAKIB.    Have you been expecting a sensation today? Biocoin is going to implement the blockchain into the Orthodox Church. Monasteries and parishes will be using biocoins. ¬´Each priest of the parish is a businessman to a degree, he builds his parish. Most of the parishes and monasteries in Russia do create some products and food that allow them to earn money for their development. And for the territory development.  This is a social business.‚Äù Besides all this, blockchain ecosystem BioCoin will soon offer the option to simultaneously exchange other crypto currencies into biocoins. Donations could potentially be made in any crypto currency, but they will be credited to the parish‚Äôs wallet application in biocoins that do have full legal status in Russia.  https://incrussia.ru/news/boris-akimov-vnedryaet-blokchejn-v-hramy/

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  Crypto analysts are predicting that last events are harbingers of the bull‚Äôs market for altcoins.  Some extracts from the article:  How to prepare for the bull‚Äôs market of altcoins?  A crypto analyst and developer of tools Python Quant for crypto traders known as Crypto Quantic Ph.D. has spoken about an upcoming bull‚Äôs market for altcoins and suggested few practical recommendations for the investors.  ‚Äú So, you bought some altcoins hoping to get on the wave and receive five, ten or even hundred times more than what you invested. If you did that, do not worry, you are not alone in this. The so called ‚Äúseason of altcoins‚Äù is coming back witnessed by mane posts on the social networks.  Problem #1 too many people have been waiting for the return of altcoins. Remember, the more people make forecasts for one or another event, the lesser the probability that this event will ever happen.  Problem #2 market cycle rules everything Market cycle could be described as an impulse wave movement where each rise is followed by a fall.  Problem#3 Low liquidity adds fuel to the fire  An asset is considered to be liquid if you can buy or sell it without influencing the price. One of the ways to evaluate asset liquidity is to check the number of sellers and buyers.  If I as an investor take my 1000 USD from altcoins to invest into bitcoins. In most cases the price of altcoins will drop by a lot, where it the price of bitcoin will not grow by much. Now multiply this by million investors and you will understand how a small turbulence in the bitcoin market can cause a major chaos in the altcoins market.  In my hunt for a promising altcoin I rely on indicators such as: -one of the altcoins should take the lead and show what it is worth ( Did it happen with Bitcoin Cash?) -long term tendency to decline should stabilize and altcoins should start being traded in a short range ( classic Bollinger‚Äôs Stripes)...‚Äù  https://decenter.org/p/32-how-to-prepare-for-the-altcoin-bull-market-rus

Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  Nowadays many people talk about the fact that blockchain presents big opportunities for loyalty systems. Here is Cointrlegraph‚Äô news about BioCoin: To illustrate why under certain circumstances it is beneficial to create a completely separate customer loyalty system, one could take a look at the newest player on the market, BioCoin.  This Russian-based startup is not just a loyalty platform designed to incentivize consumers with Blockchain-based units of value. The platform‚Äôs broader goal is to facilitate the eco-friendly and healthy agricultural paradigm worldwide.  In a nutshell, BioCoin is meant to support eco-farmers and organic food retailers and allow them to return value right into their local communities via a system of rewards and discounts. To achieve this, a separate economy is necessary because it will allow to preserve and multiply value within the community. https://cointelegraph.com/news/companies-applying-blockchain-for-better-loyalty-programs

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  Biocoin is about to get a new very serious partner! From the very start we envisioned BIO platform to become a powerful tool to help small business and farming. And credit support is one of its main points. Farmers and businessmen can already buy fertilizers, food for animals, food equipment, and much more for biocoins from businesses that have already joined the platform. BioCoin has reached an agreement with a large international project Ripio Credit Network ( http://ripiocredit.network/) about start of cooperation. In the future it would be possible to give/take loans in biocoins for business development.  What is Ripio Credit Network? It is a network that unites lenders, borrowers and guarantors. Borrowers and lenders interact via tokens that are based on Ethereum, and guarantor pledges to ensure sufficient volume of credit transactions for return of investment forecast, debt management in the borrower‚Äôs country of residence and receipt of money to pay the debt in case of a default.  One of the founders of Ripio and www.cryptoassets.fund David Garcia announced: ‚ÄúWe can certainly help BIO extend their lending fo the BioCoin platform and use BioCoin as a credit capital.‚Äù All the details of his cooperation are going to be announced by the companies this week! BioCoin.bio

It is reasonable that the issuer must have options of buying back tokens(ones issued during ICO). Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin News!  Blockchain cooperation? Yes! Today the Russian University of Cooperation arranges "Chayanov readings".  Boris Akimov  (LavkaLavka, BioCoin) was invited to develop a program of a new educational center. This center should teach the blockchain to cooperators and create an infrastructure that will allow to transfer the principles of cooperation to the blockchain. Akimov: "We want to digitize trust, to transfer trust as the basic principle of cooperation to blockchain. This will increase the efficiency of the cooperative movement. After all, trust is the fundamental instrument of cooperation." The BioCoin platform can become the basis for the development of modern cooperation.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: So, starting today we have a real implementation of BIO into our loyalty program. If you come to stores or restaurants by LavkaLavka, you get Biocoin bonus that is 5% from the total order amount. Starting February 1, 2018 these bonuses will automatically convert into Biocoins. However, now you can do that manually.  For that, you need: a) come to LavkaLavka and buy farmers‚Äô products or food at restaurants; b) join the loyalty program; for that you have to just give cashier your phone number and first and last name; c) get bonuses credited to your account; d) download crypto wallet at biocoin.bio e) send a message to magic@biocoin.bio asking to convert your bonuses into biocoins and specify your phone number (identification point in our loyalty system) and address of your crypto wallet.  That‚Äôs all!Kind of magic! All your bonuses convert into biocoins and are deposited to your crypto wallet. Here is your consumers‚Äô mining-buy products and get coins that is already listed on international crypto exchanges!and again, starting February 1 this conversion process will be automatic.

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: More news about the real life of BioCoins. Our LavkaLavka market in Mega Khimki takes BioCoins from farmers as payment for rent. BioCoins have already become part of a loyalty system that helps the cooperative and farmers. All farmers who pay rent on time receive a reward of 10 percent of the amount in BioCoins. And then these BioCoins can be used by farmers for their own purposes, for example, to pay rent in the market!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Today is a significant date. Under the direction of Elina Sidorenko, Head of the Interdepartmental Group of the State Duma on Assessing the Risks of the Turnover of the Crypto Currency, who provides full legal support for BioCoin, we prepared a legal opinion on the BioCoin project. Soon we‚Äôll publish this document on biocoin.bio!

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: With Evgeny Plotnikov, General Director of "United Farmers". This company will supply fodder, provide veterinary services and much more to farmers. "United Farmers" is joining the BioCoin project!

Author: choojoy
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: The DigRate team has assigned A2 rating score of investment attractiveness to BioCoin project, launched by the farm cooperative LavkaLavka: medium-to-high probability of investment return, considerable sensitivity to market environment.  BioCoin sets itself the global goal of uniting farms and companies that promote the principles of green economy into a single platform based on an international loyalty system. The undoubted advantage of the project is its social orientation, as well as the ability to use BIO tokens immediately after the acquisition. We conducted a detailed analysis of BioCoin and described all the pros and cons that are still present in the project.  The DigRate team reminds that investments in any crypto asset content high risk in it.  http://digrate.com/uploads/ico_report/BioCoin_ENG.pdf

Author: xottabikrus
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: Biocoin wallet installation on Ubuntu 16.04  ~$ sudo apt-get update  ~$ sudo apt-get install git qt4-qmake libqt4-dev build-essential libboost-dev libboost-system-dev  ~$ sudo apt-get install libboost-filesystem-dev libboost-program-options-dev libboost-thread-dev  ~$ sudo apt install Libdb5.3* -y  ~$ sudo git clone https://github.com/Blackithart/biocoin.git  ~$ cd ./biocoin/  ~$ sudo qmake  ~$ sudo apt-get install libqrencode-dev  ~$ make  ~$ ./BioCoin-qt  All! Working.

Author: sonder
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: - I really love the idea about development of individual farmers as opposed to corporations, which every year are poisoning the population. - I really love the economic incentives that are put in the BioCoin system (the simultaneous stimulation of production and consumption of quality farm products) - I really love the team and Lavkalavka as working business in Moscow.  But, I spent 30 minutes to quickly look at the project in more details and I was confused in two points:  1. Why you choose PeerCoin technology?  I'm sure that 10 transactions per second not fast enough for such a large project. And In general, the PeerCoin project looks abandoned. So how you are planning to solve this network bandwidth issue? Did you consider the Graphene technology?   2. What the address with the stake 83% of all BioCoins? I have looked at the rich list in biocoin explorer here http://block-explorer.biocoin.bio/richlist Address B7xseoLGk7hEpMDDeSvZDKmmiAMHWiccok have 83% of all coins. How and why?  Looking forward for you answers. I am really interested to invest in your project, but these 2 points are strong stop signals for me. And why you do not have any chat in slack or telegram? Thanks

Author: BitcoinArsenal
Title: [News] BIOCOIN - INTERNATIONAL BLOCKCHAIN-BASED LOYALTY PLATFORM
Body: BioCoin is a blockchain-based loyalty platform, created to facilitate the eco-friendly and healthy agricultural paradigm around the world. As a combination of cryptocurrency and loyalty platform, BioCoin is designed to support local farmers and organic food retailers and allow them to return value to their communities through a system of rewards and discounts. LavkaLavka has already built a foundation for BioCoin‚Äôs ecosystem through its international farming cooperative. According to the LavkaLavka team, about 20 million BioCoins are already in daily circulation, used by farmers in Russia and several other countries...more useful information
